title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST API and CLI for macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client/SDK for Ollama; install via pip install ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; npm i ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (langchain-ollama on PyPI) to use Ollama models as LLMs or embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; runs in Docker, supports multi-user, RAG, and plugins.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based TUI client for chatting with Ollama models from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration (haystack-ai[ollama]) to use Ollama models in pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB for local Q&A.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Community n8n node to call Ollama models inside low-code workflows; published on npm.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java SDK for Ollama (Maven Central: ollama4j) with Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C#/.NET client (NuGet: OllamaSharp) supporting streaming and embeddings.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to cache and serve Ollama models inside CI pipelines.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate (crates.io: ollama-rs) with Tokio async support.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit component template for chatting with Ollama models in a Shareable web app.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client (pkg.go.dev: github.com/ollama-go/ollama) with generated types.

title: ollama-huggingface
summary: HF transformers example showing how to convert & quantize models for Ollama.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official registry of Modelfile recipes (Llama 2, Mistral, CodeLlama, etc.) maintained by Ollama.
